com.desafio.ponto.service.persistence.impl

Class PontoDiaPersistenceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.liferay.portal.kernel.service.persistence.impl.BasePersistenceImpl<PontoDia>
      • com.desafio.ponto.service.persistence.impl.PontoDiaPersistenceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PontoDiaPersistence, com.liferay.portal.kernel.dao.orm.SessionFactory, com.liferay.portal.kernel.service.persistence.BasePersistence<PontoDia>

    @ProviderType
public class PontoDiaPersistenceImpl
extends com.liferay.portal.kernel.service.persistence.impl.BasePersistenceImpl<PontoDia>
implements PontoDiaPersistence
    The persistence implementation for the ponto dia service.

    Caching information and settings can be found in portal.properties

    Author:
    Peterson Morais
    See Also:
    PontoDiaPersistence, PontoDiaUtil

      • findByFindByCompetencia

        public java.util.List<PontoDia> findByFindByCompetencia(long Pis,
                                                        java.lang.String Competencia,
                                                        int start,
                                                        int end)
        Returns a range of all the ponto dias where Pis = ? and Competencia = ?.

        Useful when paginating results. Returns a maximum of end - start instances. start and end are not primary keys, they are indexes in the result set. Thus, 0 refers to the first result in the set. Setting both start and end to QueryUtil.ALL_POS will return the full result set. If orderByComparator is specified, then the query will include the given ORDER BY logic. If orderByComparator is absent and pagination is required (start and end are not QueryUtil.ALL_POS), then the query will include the default ORDER BY logic from PontoDiaModelImpl. If both orderByComparator and pagination are absent, for performance reasons, the query will not have an ORDER BY clause and the returned result set will be sorted on by the primary key in an ascending order.

        Specified by:
        findByFindByCompetencia in interface PontoDiaPersistence
        Parameters:
        Pis - the pis
        Competencia - the competencia
        start - the lower bound of the range of ponto dias
        end - the upper bound of the range of ponto dias (not inclusive)
        Returns:
        the range of matching ponto dias

      • findByFindByCompetencia

        public java.util.List<PontoDia> findByFindByCompetencia(long Pis,
                                                        java.lang.String Competencia,
                                                        int start,
                                                        int end,
                                                        com.liferay.portal.kernel.util.OrderByComparator<PontoDia> orderByComparator)
        Returns an ordered range of all the ponto dias where Pis = ? and Competencia = ?.

        Useful when paginating results. Returns a maximum of end - start instances. start and end are not primary keys, they are indexes in the result set. Thus, 0 refers to the first result in the set. Setting both start and end to QueryUtil.ALL_POS will return the full result set. If orderByComparator is specified, then the query will include the given ORDER BY logic. If orderByComparator is absent and pagination is required (start and end are not QueryUtil.ALL_POS), then the query will include the default ORDER BY logic from PontoDiaModelImpl. If both orderByComparator and pagination are absent, for performance reasons, the query will not have an ORDER BY clause and the returned result set will be sorted on by the primary key in an ascending order.

        Specified by:
        findByFindByCompetencia in interface PontoDiaPersistence
        Parameters:
        Pis - the pis
        Competencia - the competencia
        start - the lower bound of the range of ponto dias
        end - the upper bound of the range of ponto dias (not inclusive)
        orderByComparator - the comparator to order the results by (optionally null)
        Returns:
        the ordered range of matching ponto dias

      • findByFindByCompetencia

        public java.util.List<PontoDia> findByFindByCompetencia(long Pis,
                                                        java.lang.String Competencia,
                                                        int start,
                                                        int end,
                                                        com.liferay.portal.kernel.util.OrderByComparator<PontoDia> orderByComparator,
                                                        boolean retrieveFromCache)
        Returns an ordered range of all the ponto dias where Pis = ? and Competencia = ?.

        Useful when paginating results. Returns a maximum of end - start instances. start and end are not primary keys, they are indexes in the result set. Thus, 0 refers to the first result in the set. Setting both start and end to QueryUtil.ALL_POS will return the full result set. If orderByComparator is specified, then the query will include the given ORDER BY logic. If orderByComparator is absent and pagination is required (start and end are not QueryUtil.ALL_POS), then the query will include the default ORDER BY logic from PontoDiaModelImpl. If both orderByComparator and pagination are absent, for performance reasons, the query will not have an ORDER BY clause and the returned result set will be sorted on by the primary key in an ascending order.

        Specified by:
        findByFindByCompetencia in interface PontoDiaPersistence
        Parameters:
        Pis - the pis
        Competencia - the competencia
        start - the lower bound of the range of ponto dias
        end - the upper bound of the range of ponto dias (not inclusive)
        orderByComparator - the comparator to order the results by (optionally null)
        retrieveFromCache - whether to retrieve from the finder cache
        Returns:
        the ordered range of matching ponto dias

      • clearCache

        public void clearCache()
        Clears the cache for all ponto dias.

        The EntityCache and FinderCache are both cleared by this method.

      • findAll

        public java.util.List<PontoDia> findAll()
        Returns all the ponto dias.
        Specified by:
        findAll in interface PontoDiaPersistence
        Returns:
        the ponto dias

      • findAll

        public java.util.List<PontoDia> findAll(int start,
                                        int end)
        Returns a range of all the ponto dias.

        Useful when paginating results. Returns a maximum of end - start instances. start and end are not primary keys, they are indexes in the result set. Thus, 0 refers to the first result in the set. Setting both start and end to QueryUtil.ALL_POS will return the full result set. If orderByComparator is specified, then the query will include the given ORDER BY logic. If orderByComparator is absent and pagination is required (start and end are not QueryUtil.ALL_POS), then the query will include the default ORDER BY logic from PontoDiaModelImpl. If both orderByComparator and pagination are absent, for performance reasons, the query will not have an ORDER BY clause and the returned result set will be sorted on by the primary key in an ascending order.

        Specified by:
        findAll in interface PontoDiaPersistence
        Parameters:
        start - the lower bound of the range of ponto dias
        end - the upper bound of the range of ponto dias (not inclusive)
        Returns:
        the range of ponto dias

      • findAll

        public java.util.List<PontoDia> findAll(int start,
                                        int end,
                                        com.liferay.portal.kernel.util.OrderByComparator<PontoDia> orderByComparator)
        Returns an ordered range of all the ponto dias.

        Useful when paginating results. Returns a maximum of end - start instances. start and end are not primary keys, they are indexes in the result set. Thus, 0 refers to the first result in the set. Setting both start and end to QueryUtil.ALL_POS will return the full result set. If orderByComparator is specified, then the query will include the given ORDER BY logic. If orderByComparator is absent and pagination is required (start and end are not QueryUtil.ALL_POS), then the query will include the default ORDER BY logic from PontoDiaModelImpl. If both orderByComparator and pagination are absent, for performance reasons, the query will not have an ORDER BY clause and the returned result set will be sorted on by the primary key in an ascending order.

        Specified by:
        findAll in interface PontoDiaPersistence
        Parameters:
        start - the lower bound of the range of ponto dias
        end - the upper bound of the range of ponto dias (not inclusive)
        orderByComparator - the comparator to order the results by (optionally null)
        Returns:
        the ordered range of ponto dias

      • findAll

        public java.util.List<PontoDia> findAll(int start,
                                        int end,
                                        com.liferay.portal.kernel.util.OrderByComparator<PontoDia> orderByComparator,
                                        boolean retrieveFromCache)
        Returns an ordered range of all the ponto dias.

        Useful when paginating results. Returns a maximum of end - start instances. start and end are not primary keys, they are indexes in the result set. Thus, 0 refers to the first result in the set. Setting both start and end to QueryUtil.ALL_POS will return the full result set. If orderByComparator is specified, then the query will include the given ORDER BY logic. If orderByComparator is absent and pagination is required (start and end are not QueryUtil.ALL_POS), then the query will include the default ORDER BY logic from PontoDiaModelImpl. If both orderByComparator and pagination are absent, for performance reasons, the query will not have an ORDER BY clause and the returned result set will be sorted on by the primary key in an ascending order.

        Specified by:
        findAll in interface PontoDiaPersistence
        Parameters:
        start - the lower bound of the range of ponto dias
        end - the upper bound of the range of ponto dias (not inclusive)
        orderByComparator - the comparator to order the results by (optionally null)
        retrieveFromCache - whether to retrieve from the finder cache
